description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Come on! Grab your board and challenge gravity! Jump from the roof of the buildings performing crazy stunts. Surpass yourself on twelve timetrials or challenge your friends online. Feel the wind on your face and laugh at danger to get your name to the top of the scoreboards.
description.short: Come on! Grab your board and challenge gravity! Jump from the roof of the buildings performing crazy stunts. Surpass yourself on twelve timetrials or challenge your friends online. Feel the wind on your face and laugh at danger to get your name to the top of the scoreboards.
